column5: Know you can start backing off the mag and spool tensioner until you get some back lash or just slowly loosen the spool tension until the weight slowly falls to the ground about a foot per second mabye a bit slower and pitch till your arm falls off way easier to learn in the yard than on the water keep at it its worth the hassle.
i hear ya. the bait caster even 'feels' better then the spin caster, although the callista is wrong handed for me, it feels comfortable reeling with my right hand. kinda feels like soneone else
The reel isn't wrong handed...Spinning was invented by the French. That should explain why it is backwards...HAHAHA!
